attributes.action: place the various grammar schools in our nation under the official protection of the state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent events affecting the grammar schools in this nation and the difficulties which it appears they will have to face quite soon, we hereby request that all grammar schools currently operating and yet to be founded be placed under the official and everlasting protection of the state, to be kept in a condition so that they are free from the worries of abolishment, mergers, or proposed changes unless the potential effects of such changes have been investigated in detail prior to their introduction.
